title: [已解决]有关Caused by: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError问题的求助
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1216435209 于 2018-6-16 20:14 编辑 

在后台（Console）使用命令时出现错误，错误如下：
[00:04:09] [Server thread/WARN] [Minecraft/]: Unexpected exception while parsing console command "ww"
org.bukkit.command.CommandException: Unhandled exception executing command 'ww' in plugin Werewolf vsnapshot 0.1
        


at org.bukkit.command.PluginCommand.execute(PluginCommand.java:46) ~[PluginCommand.class:1.7.10-R0.1-SNAPSHOT]
        
at org.bukkit.command.SimpleCommandMap.dispatch(SimpleCommandMap.java:181) ~[SimpleCommandMap.class:1.7.10-R0.1-SNAPSHOT]
        
at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_7_R4.CraftServer.dispatchCommand(CraftServer.java:717) ~[CraftServer.class:1.7.10-R0.1-SNAPSHOT]
        
at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_7_R4.CraftServer.dispatchServerCommand(CraftServer.java:697) [CraftServer.class:1.7.10-R0.1-SNAPSHOT]
        
at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.func_71333_ah(DedicatedServer.java:473) [lt.class:?]

at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_121]




Caused by: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/github/MrMks/Werewolf_V3/Command/CommandExecutor/CommandManager
        
at com.github.MrMks.Werewolf_V3.BukkitSupport.Commands.WerewolfCommandExecutor.onCommand(WerewolfCommandExecutor.java:23) ~[?:?]
        
at org.bukkit.command.PluginCommand.execute(PluginCommand.java:44) ~[PluginCommand.class:1.7.10-R0.1-SNAPSHOT]
        ... 8 more

at org.bukkit.command.PluginCommand.execute(PluginCommand.java:44) ~[PluginCommand.class:1.7.10-R0.1-SNAPSHOT]
        ... 8 more

类源代码：
WerewolfCommandExecutor
CommandManager

求教，怎样才能解决这个问题，并返回正确的提示语
（“未知指令”）

replies.txt_content: 补充说明：我希望Console和Player均能够使用该命令
